items.title: HAL confirms Rs 62,000-crore mega order for 97 LCA Mk-1A fighter jets
items.description: It was reported on August 20 that the Cabinet Committee on Security has cleared the mega defence deal to boost India’s air power

items.title: Global Health: In the pink of health, but growth will come at a price
items.description: Demand for high-end healthcare facilities remains strong; however, the company’s valuation appears demanding

items.title: India sees Asia's biggest earnings downgrades as US tariffs loom
items.description: According to LSEG IBES data, forward 12-month earnings estimates for India's large and mid-cap firms have been cut by 1.2% in the past two weeks, the sharpest in Asia

items.title: Ban on real money games to curb negative impact on society: Ashwini Vaishnaw
items.description: The minister refused to divulge details about the timeline of the implementation of the bill and if any opportunity will be provided to the gaming firms to make the required changes

items.title: Smartphone maker Vivo expands ZEISS partnership under new imaging strategy
items.description: The initiative aims to make R&D in night photography, portraits, telephoto, and video, while expanding into health and cross-device applications.

items.title: Vivo enters mixed reality device race with Vision headset
items.description: The debut marks a milestone for Vivo, making it the first Chinese smartphone brand to extend into MR hardware. The company said it took four years to develop the device
